content.question: Developments such as the one depicted in the painting most directly contributed to which of the following in Afro-Eurasia in the fourteenth and fifteenth centuries?

choices.label: Peasant revolts against taxation and coercive labor systems

content.answer: Peasant revolts against taxation and coercive labor systems
